aboutMe: I am a NodeJS Backend Developer with 2+ years of experience in designing and building backend services using microservice architecture. My strongest advantage and also my passion is the knowledge and understanding of various aspects of software development including design principles, architectural patterns, testing, and software methodology.  I still have a lot of rooms for improvement and I will take any opportunities to leverage myself and contribute my best to the products

profile.introduction: Hi, I'm a NodeJS backend developer and looking for a new journey of my career

skills: AWS: API Gateway, Lambda, DynamoDB, S3, SQS, Eventbridge, Step Functions, etc
System debugging and monitoring: Grafana, Rancher, Dynatrace
API Testing and Documentation: Swagger, Postman
Understand principles of Unit Test and Integration Test
Understanding of essential data structures and algorithms

achievements: Build app using Lambda, API Gateway and DynamoDB
Build backend service APIs for gaming apps on native cloud with k8s and AWS.
Take part in analyzing and designing many core services.
Responsible for writing integration tests and E2E tests for the backend system.
Perform load tests for backend services using k6.
Monitor and debugging system with multiple tools like Grafana, Rancher, Dynatrace, etc.
Responsible for code review and release process of the product.
Actively contribute ideas and improvements for team management and working process
Build E-commerce system using NestJS, MongoDB and Supabase. The app is deployed using Railway.

projects.title: ACOMAP (WIP)
projects.description: A web app which allows you to look up to accommodations or dormitories directly on a map.

projects.title: Dictensionary
projects.description: Looks up words on dictionary, saves your word with context and highlights it on every page you visit
